altername_name: Real Bout Garou Densetsu 2: The Newcomers
RB2: The Newcomers: Real Bout Garou Densetsu 2: RB2: The Newcomers: Real Bout Fatal Fury 2
Real Bout Fatal Fury 2: The Newcomers
name: RB2: The Newcomers: Real Bout Fatal Fury 2
overview: Real Bout Fatal Fury 2: The Newcomers (stylized as RB2: The Newcomers, known in Japan as Real Bout Garou Densetsu 2 - The Newcomers, the former sub-title loosely translating to "Real Bout: Legend of the Hungry Wolf 2") is a 1998 fighting game by SNK for the Neo Geo platform. It is the seventh game in the Fatal Fury series and the third game in the Real Bout sub-series, following Real Bout Fatal Fury and Real Bout Fatal Fury Special. The game uses the same graphics as Real Bout Special, but returns to the same fighting system from the original Real Bout. This entry adds Rick Strowd and Li Xiangfei as playable characters, and Geese Howard makes his return as well!
